original_text: And there were six steps to the throne, with a footstool of gold, which were fastened to the throne, and stays on each side of the sitting place, and two lions standing by the stays:
korean_text: 그 보좌에는 여섯 층계와 금 발판이 있어 보좌와 이어졌고 앉는 자리 양쪽에는 팔걸이가 있고 팔걸이 곁에는 사자가 하나씩 섰으며

sentences.original_text: And there were six steps to the throne,
which were fastened to the throne,
and stays on each side of the sitting place,
and two lions standing by the stays:
sentences.korean_translation: 지지대 옆에는 두 마리의 사자가 서 있었다:
